title: Does It Solve Anything?
description:
Today let's chat about something that so many of us forget to think about when creating a new product: Are you actually solving a problem? 
It seems a simple thing to say but many products appear to exist to solve a problem no one ever identified.

So let's get into it!


Check out CopyAI: www.copy.ai?via=leo-guinan
As well as PlaygroundAI: https://playgroundai.com/ 

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!

#building #technology #solution #problem
